mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.office_id AS "officeId", a.class_id AS "classId", a.user_id AS "userId", a.title AS "title", a.content AS "content", a.images AS "images", a.create_date AS "createDate", su.name AS "userName", CASE WHEN a.class_id = 'ALL' THEN "全园" WHEN a.class_id = 'STUDENT' THEN "全体学生" WHEN a.class_id = 'TEACHER' THEN "全体老师" ELSE (select GROUP_CONCAT(n.name) from c_class n where FIND_IN_SET(n.id,a.class_id)) END AS "className"
LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON a.user_id = su.id
mapper.select:
SELECT ,
CASE WHEN c.notice_id IS NULL THEN ( CASE WHEN #{userType} = 3 OR #{obj.userId} = su.id THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) ELSE 1 END AS "isRead"
FROM c_notice a
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT y.notice_id FROM c_notice z LEFT JOIN c_notice_user y ON z.id = y.notice_id WHERE y.user_id = #{obj.userId} ) c ON a.id = c.notice_id WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND a.office_id = #{obj.officeId}
AND ( FIND_IN_SET(#{obj.classId},a.class_id) OR a.class_id = 'ALL'
OR a.class_id = 'TEACHER'
OR a.class_id = 'STUDENT' )
ORDER BY a.create_date DESC
LIMIT #{offset},#{limit}

SELECT u.name, u.image_id, CASE WHEN x.user_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS "isRead" FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN c_notice z ON 1 = 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.user_id FROM c_notice_user a WHERE a.notice_id = #{obj.id} ) x ON u.id = x.user_id WHERE z.del_flag = 0 AND u.office_id = #{obj.officeId}
AND u.user_type = 5
AND u.user_type = 4
AND FIND_IN_SET(u.class_id,#{noticeType})
AND z.id = #{obj.id}
AND u.create_date <= z.create_date AND z.user_id <> u.id
ORDER BY isRead DESC, u.user_type, u.id
